name: Bee Spree
description:
BEE SPREE

Let there BEE chaos! 

In this game, you're a beekeeper. Water a particular purple plant and keep your bees safe! Things will escalate from there, since evil awaits... 

CONTROLS 

WASD to move

 CLICK/LMB to use the axe

 SPACE to interact 

By thecoolestnoodle and madhUH. Enjoy!

PS:If you get stuck, try watering the plant more (go close to it and press space while holding the watering can). Make sure you are zoomed out fully and are on fullscreen mode. Also sorry, there are 2 typos that i wasn't able to fix in time.
